name: hugo-oblate-theme
description: Oblate theme for hugo is a minimalistic theme for bloggers based on the theme of the same-named Oblate from [Tania Rascia](//github.com/taniarascia). Noteworthy features of this Hugo theme are the support for RSS feeds, syntax highlighting for source code.
author: Thor Jubera Albo <thor.jubera.albo@gmail.com> (https://zapatran.dev)
